body:
## Breaking Changes
The `internal` package has been removed. The APIs exposed in `internal` were never considered to be public, but were nonetheless possible for external packages to import. This is no longer possible. If you were relying on an API that was exposed via `internal`, please file an issue.

## What's Changed
* Makefile: add GRADLE argument by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/218
* Update Buf logo in README by @smallsamantha in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/219
* Bump com.google.guava:guava from 33.3.1-jre to 33.4.0-jre by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/224
* Update proto generated code to match runtime version by @pkwarren in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/231
* Bump com.diffplug.spotless:spotless-plugin-gradle from 6.25.0 to 7.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/228, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/234
* Bump org.assertj:assertj-core from 3.26.3 to 3.27.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/220, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/225, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/232
* Refactor the API for v1 by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/226
* Add URN validation to URI rule by @smaye81 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/236
* Remove support for deprecated options by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/235
* Bump com.uber.nullaway:nullaway from 0.12.1 to 0.12.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/217, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/227, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/239
* Bump maven-publish from 0.30.0 to 0.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/242
* Bump com.google.protobuf:protobuf-java from 4.28.3 to 4.30.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/216, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/222, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/230, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/243
* Bump build.buf:buf from 1.47.2 to 1.50.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/221, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/229, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/233, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/245
* Fix custom predefined rules with repeated nested message values by @jrinehart-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/246
* Bump org.junit:junit-bom from 5.11.3 to 5.12.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/223, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/237, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/244
* Update to protovalidate 0.10.3 by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/247

## New Contributors
* @smallsamantha made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/219
* @smaye81 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/236
* @jrinehart-buf made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/246
* @timostamm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/pull/247

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-java/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0
name: v0.6.0
